source(allowSchemaDrift: true,

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared australia_cities_txt = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://storageaccountalexpt253.dfs.core.windows.net/containeralex/AUSTRALIA_CITIES.txt"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(PromotedHeaders, {{"NO_COUNTRY", each Text.Proper(_), type text}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"NO_CITY", each Text.Proper(_), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Capitalized each word 1", {{"DT_UPDATE", type date}, {"SALES", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Inserted conditional column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type", "SALES_PERFORMANCE", each if [SALES] >= 100 then "HIGH" else "LOW")
in
  #"Inserted conditional column";
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = population_txt
in
  Source;
